titleStmt.title: The history of S. Elizabeth daughter of the King of Hungary According to sundry authours who haue authentically written her life, distributed into three bookes. By H.A. Permissu superiorum.
titleStmt.author: Hawkins, Henry, 1571?-1646.
Picart, Jean, engraver.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
With an additional title page, engraved, signed: I. Picart inue. fe.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
